sentences.en: During the spasm of alarm over Norway, he had once visited the Florence consulate.
sentences.cn: 在挪威引起的那场惊慌时, 他曾经找过佛罗伦萨领事馆.

sentences.en: How do those prawns find their way from Norway to the supermarket shelf?
sentences.cn: 这些对虾是如何从挪威跑到超市货架上来的呢？

sentences.en: I've been bombarded by the press and television since I came back from Norway.
sentences.cn: 从挪威回来后我就一直被报纸和电视台的记者纠缠不休。

sentences.en: In Norway Willy supported himself by newspapering.
sentences.cn: 威利在挪威以办报为生.

sentences.en: Norway had held Holland to a scoreless draw in Rotterdam.
sentences.cn: 挪威队在鹿特丹以零比零逼平荷兰队。

sentences.en: Norway has a fair sprinkling of women ministers.
Norway has four distinct seasons, even though it in the extreme north.
sentences.cn: 虽然挪威位处极北, 但它的四季分明.

sentences.en: Norway has quadrupled its exports to the EU.
sentences.cn: 挪威对欧盟的出口已经增加了3倍。

sentences.en: Norway's budget surplus has fallen from 5.9% in 1986 to an expected 0.1% this year.
sentences.cn: 挪威的预算盈余已经从1986年的5.9%降至今年预计的0.1%。

sentences.en: Now we know that someone from Norway can do it.
sentences.cn: 现在我们知道挪威的某些人可以这么做。

sentences.en: Pacifist movements gathered strength in Norway.
sentences.cn: 在挪威,和平主义的运动力量逐渐增强.

sentences.en: Sweden has frontiers with Norway and Finland.
The Russo - Finnish war made the problem of Norway acute.
sentences.cn: 苏芬战争使挪威问题尖锐化.

sentences.en: The sea fisheries are an important industry in Norway.
sentences.cn: 海洋捕鱼业是挪威一项重要的产业.

sentences.en: They tried to chart the sea area between Norway and Denmark.
sentences.cn: 他们企图绘制挪威与丹麦之间的海域图。

sentences.en: Trotsky lived in turn in Turkey, France, Norway and finally Mexico.
sentences.cn: 托洛茨基曾先后在土耳其 、 法国和挪威住过,最后住在墨西哥.

sentences.en: Visit the Embassy's homepage at www. norway. cn, then contact a travel agency.
sentences.cn: 登录www. norway. cn,查阅大使馆网站首页, 然后与一家旅行社取得联系.
